text: ovunda, obada hamu vu avasthavedi ovunge gananaya obage æsvalata adu karada, obage gananaya ovunge æsvalata adu karada, penvuye allah manakkalpita kala karanava istha vi, anivaryayenma (ovunva vinasa kara) dæmimata (yanna oba dæna ganu). allahge sannidhanayehima siyalu karanavan gos avasan vanneya
